Struct TLx493D_ComLibraryFunctions_t¶

  • Defined in File tlx493d_types.h

Struct Documentation¶

struct TLx493D_ComLibraryFunctions_t¶

The structure TLx493D_ComLibraryFunctions_t stores the function pointers which are needed for the initialization and the transfer of data, for each communication interface.
